Recap: Jessica is ready for her prom, detecting that Cristian may be concerned or even jealous over hear interest in other guys. She appears friendly to both Brody and to Ford with the sole intent being making Cristian jealous. Viki and Clint talk to Marty about their concerns for their daugther. Marty is able to "intercept" the letter that Natalie left for John so that he does not have a chance to read it. ANd he finds out that she may hae taken a letter from his office. Langston is less than enthused about her prom since she wants to break up with Markko yet cannot admit it to anybody. Kelly has a date with Ford. But Dorian insists that Shaun Evans goes with her as her bodyguard.
